name: Mark (Rachow || Rachel Howard)
description:
Version 0.1.1
Thanks for helping me test this early version of this project! If you have a moment, please fill out this quick questionaire https://forms.gle/i2DKRPz4tHxcSNKh9

Controls:

Move the mouse to move the player character
Flick the mouse quickly to jump
Press P to pause/unpause
Hold the mouse button (right or left) to stand still

Dev Hotkeys:

Q - reload scene (you know, if you get stuck)
